product_name: REI Quarter Dome T1 Tent - Special Buy
long_description: The REI Quarter Dome T1 semi-freestanding tent uses lightweight materials and a unique pole design to create a strong, well-ventilated 3-season backpacking tent for all your solo adventures.
short_description: The REI Quarter Dome T1 semi-freestanding tent uses lightweight materials and a unique pole design to create a strong, well-ventilated 3-season backpacking tent for all your solo adventures.
